name: admin.apps.restricted.list
desc: List restricted apps for an org or workspace.

certified.desc: Limit the results to only include certified apps. When false, no certified apps will appear in the result.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Must be between 1 - 1000 both inclusive.

errors.app_management_app_not_installed_on_org: The app management app must be installed on the org.
errors.feature_not_enabled: Returned when the Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team
errors.invalid_actor: The provided actor_id is not a valid user or application
errors.invalid_cursor: Value passed for `cursor` was not valid or is no longer valid.
errors.not_allowed: The user is not allowed to access this API method
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org/workspace owners and admins
errors.team_not_found: Returned when team id is not found.
errors.restricted_action: User does not have permission to access method
